topics.title: The Number System and Its Classification
topics.description: An Introduction to number systems, their types, and importance in mathematics and computing basics.

topics.title: Fundamental Theorem of Arithmetic (Prime Factorization)
topics.description: Learn how the Fundamental Theorem of Arithmetic shows that every number has a unique prime factorization.

topics.title: Zeros of a Polynomial
topics.description: Understanding the concept and methods to find the zeros of a polynomial function.

topics.title: Remainder Theorem & Factor Theorem
topics.description: Understand the Remainder Theorem and Factor Theorem for polynomial division and roots.

topics.title: Introduction to Linear Equations in Two Variables
topics.description: Introduction to linear variables and their role in mathematical modeling and analysis.

topics.title: Applications and Solution of Linear Equations
topics.description: Introduction to solving linear equations and their real-life applications.

topics.title: Similar Figures and Similar Triangles
topics.description: Basics of Similar Figures and Triangles with properties and real-life applications.

topics.title: Pythagoras Theorem & Converse
topics.description: Understanding Pythagoras Theorem and its converse with practical geometric applications.

topics.title: Statistics
topics.description: Basics of Statistics and its role in data analysis and interpretation.
